panels.description:
- The total wait time of the summarized events that are timed.
- = Active session
panels.title: Total - SQL Time

panels.description: The Number of executions per second of statements.
panels.title: Total - Executions

panels.description: The number of rows read during statements' execution.
panels.title: Total - Rows examined

panels.description: The number of rows returned during statements' execution.
panels.title: Total - Rows sent

panels.description:
- read rows = read_rnd_next + read_next + read_prev
- read_rnd_next: The number of requests to read the next row in the data file. This value is high if you are doing a lot of table scans.
- read_next : The number of requests to read the next row in key order. This value is incremented if you are querying an index column with a range constraint or if you are doing an index scan.
- read_prev: The number of requests to read the previous row in key order. This read method is mainly used to optimize ORDER BY ... DESC.
panels.title: Handler - read rows

panels.description: Top SQL ordered by Elapsed Time

targets.expr:
topk(200, 
     sum ((mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_seconds_total{digest_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"} -
           mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_seconds_total{digest_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"} offset $__range)
          or mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_seconds_total{digest_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"})
     by (job, alias, instance, digest, digest_text, schema)
    )

topk(200, 
     sum ((mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_total{digest_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"} -
           mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_total{digest_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"} offset $__range)
          or mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_total{digest_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"})
     by (job, alias, instance, digest, digest_text, schema)
    )

topk(200, 
     sum ((mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_rows_examined_total{digest_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"} -
           mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_rows_examined_total{digest_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"} offset $__range)
          or mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_rows_examined_total{digest_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*", alias=~"$alias"})
     by (job, alias, instance, digest, digest_text, schema)
    )

topk(200,(
   sum(max_over_time(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_seconds_total{alias=~"$alias", digest_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv) -
       min_over_time(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_seconds_total{alias=~"$alias", digest_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv))
    by (job, alias, instance, digest, digest_text, schema)
)) >= ((1-$use_diff)*100000000000000000000000000000000000000000)

topk(200,(
   sum(max_over_time(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_total{alias=~"$alias", digest_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv) -
       min_over_time(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_total{alias=~"$alias", digest_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv))
    by (job, alias, instance, digest, digest_text, schema)
)) >= ((1-$use_diff)*100000000000000000000000000000000000000000)

topk(200,(
   sum(max_over_time(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_rows_examined_total{alias=~"$alias", digest_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv) -
       min_over_time(mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_rows_examined_total{alias=~"$alias", digest_text=~"(?s)(?i).*$filter.*"}[$__range] offset $diff_intv))
    by (job, alias, instance, digest, digest_text, schema)
)) >= ((1-$use_diff)*100000000000000000000000000000000000000000)

panels.description: Top SQL ordered by Elapsed Time

targets.expr:
topk(5, 
     sum ((mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_seconds_total{digest=~"$digest.*", alias=~"$alias"} -
           mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_seconds_total{digest=~"$digest.*", alias=~"$alias"} offset $__range)
          or mysql_perf_schema_events_statements_seconds_total{digest=~"$digest.*", alias=~"$alias"})
     by (job, alias, instance, digest, digest_text, schema)
    )
